article: My husband had just bought a new washing machine for me. I decided to use it the _ day, and I washed a lot of things. Everything worked _ , but I couldn't find _ of my husband's socks though I had looked _ for it. The next morning, I got ready for _ as usual. When the bell rang, the students came in. I greeted them and told them _ we were going to do that day . When I turned _ to write on the blackboard, the class burst out _ . They laughed and laughed. They laughed so much, in fact, that I was _ the headmaster would be in to see all this. I asked the class to stop , but the _ I talked , the more they laughed. So I thought I had better pay _ attention to them and continue to write on the blackboard. When I did this, they laughed even more. Before long, the teacher who had the room next to _ came to see _ all the laughter was about. When he came in, he started _ , too. " Good Heavens!" I said . " Will _ please tell me what is so _ ? " " Oh, God, " said the teacher. " You have a brown _ stuck to the back of your shirt. " So that's _ I found my husband's missing sock. " Oh, well, " I said to the class, " Let's just say you have had an unforgettable lesson on static electricity ."
